overview: These tough WWII gals are stuck working factory jobs while their men are at war. When Nikki shows up looking for work, the other gals show her that a lady can work a horny, lonely ass and pussy just as good as any man! Jayden and Kortney are pumped their cheerleading tryouts went so well, but in the locker room, their fun just begins when the new, long legged slut on the other team shows up to get her missing pom pom. Chastity Lynn and Kristina Rose are failing badly their French class taught by professor Katsuni. Leilani Leeane works at a strip club where she performs a private show for Emily Addison. Dana V goes back to her old house to get her mail. She seeks her ex boyfriend's new girlfriend, Dana D to find out where it is.
title: Hot and Mean 9
